name: Finn (only name, refuses to give caste designation)
core_wound: Watched their mother die from work-related injury with no compensation, learned at young age that system doesn't value Gamma lives
needs: To believe change is possible, to fight back instead of just survive
voice_markers: Laconic, says a lot with few words
contradiction: Cynical about change but can't stop hoping, claims not to care but is fiercely loyal
physical_description: Androgynous, ambiguous ethnicity, Gamma-modification gives them enhanced reflexes, lean and quick, missing two fingers from industrial accident, shaved head, always wearing layered coats with hidden pockets
skills: Pickpocketing and theft - best in the undercity
Information broker - knows everyone and everything
flaws: Drift use, though less than Jax
Tendency to run when things get serious
knowledge_state_book1_start: Who can be trusted and who's an informant
Station's blind spots and security gaps

relationships.Jax Varro: Best friend, maybe in love with him but never says it, would die for him
relationships.Elara Quinn: Suspicious of her initially, very slowly accepts her
relationships.The Undercity: Knows everyone, is everyone's friend and no one's friend
relationships.Station Authority: Pure hatred, lost too much to them
